attributes.action: ensure all those caught illegally trying to enter UK are put on a database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That all those caught trying to illegally enter the UK, especially those from France and the Benelux countries are fingerprinted and their details entered on a database. If found later to have entered any claim should be rejected and they should be deported back to the country they were found in.
